title: Gluten-Free Vegan Chocolate Zucchini Bread Recipe
full_text:
Gluten-Free Vegan Chocolate Zucchini Bread Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe

10 mins
Cook
70 mins

25 mins

5 mins

85 mins

12 servings

(Keep screen awake)

(
almond

8
ounces
) grated
zucchini
Directions
Adjust oven rack to middle position and preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Lightly spray a 9- by 5-inch loaf pan with non-stick cooking spray. In small bowl, whisk together ground flax seed and water. Set aside.
In large bowl, whisk together brown rice flour, dark brown sugar, sorghum flour, cornstarch, cocoa powder, baking powder, baking soda, pumpkin pie spice, salt, and xanthan gum. Add ground flax seed mixture, oil, and dairy-free milk. Whisk to combine. Batter will be thick. Switch to a rubber spatula, and stir in grated zucchini. Spread batter evenly into prepared pan.
Bake until loaf is set and a cake tester comes out clean, about 70 minutes. Allow loaf to cool in pan for 5 minutes before turning out onto a wire rack.
Special Equipment
9- by 5-inch loaf pan
Quick Breads
Gluten-free Breakfast & Brunch
Chocolate
Zucchini & Yellow Squash
